Welcome to White Oak, TX!
Welcome to White Oak, TX!

White Oak Mission Statement

**"Empowering our community through unity, innovation, and sustainable growth, the City of White Oak is dedicated to fostering a safe, welcoming, and vibrant environment. We take pride in preserving our rich heritage and traditions while embracing progress, ensuring a high quality of life for all residents. Committed to transparent governance and collaboration, we aim to enhance infrastructure, promote economic development, and celebrate the diverse strengths that make White Oak a place we are proud to call home."**

[![](../ic?i=calendar&c2=%235c0223&c3=%23ededed)Calendar](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/calendar)[![](../ic?i=book&c2=%235c0223&c3=%23ededed)Agendas & Minutes](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/agendasandminutes)[![](../ic?i=money&c2=%235c0223&c3=%23ededed)Payments](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/makeapayment)[![](../ic?i=pencil&c2=%235c0223&c3=%23ededed)Forms & Permits](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/formsandpermits)[![](../ic?i=map&c2=%235c0223&c3=%23ededed)Explore](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/explore)

**Nestled in the rolling hills and piney woods of North East Texas, White Oak is located on US Highway 80 in Gregg County about 125 miles east of Dallas. White Oak welcomes you home to safe neighborhoods, superior schools, family oriented living, and genuine community spirit.  
  
From clean parks and little league baseball games to the White Oak Roughneck Day Festival, White Oak offers all residents a higher quality of life.**

**Once simply a bedroom community to Longview, White Oak has matured into a city that offers modern services and conveniences, while maintaining the friendliness and tranquility for which it has always been known.**

**White Oak remains a small town (the current population per the 2020 census is 6,225), with its advantageous location just west of Longview, White Oak residents are able to enjoy small town living and still conveniently take advantage of cultural and shopping opportunities in a large metropolitan area.**

What's Happening?

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
